item.title: Debugging a failing OpenStack image
item.author: Antoine Martin
item.description: The problem On my alpine-openstack-vm project, There is a CI process producing a VM image for OpenStack. The process involves testing that the machine boots. The test fails, but the machine is actually booted. What doesnâ€™t work is the ssh access. As the machine can only be reached via SSH with a private key for obvious security reasons, not having access prevents proper debug. The objective The objective is to be able to run the produced VM locally to assess the issue.
